card.name: Seraph, Special Snowflake
card.text: {2}{S}: Put an ice counter on target tapped nonsnow, nonland permanent. Permanents with ice counters on them are snow, don't untap during their controllers' untap steps and have "{1}: Remove an ice counter from this permanent."

card.name: Ruler of All That Is and Ever Will Be
card.text: Don't look at me, I can't read it either.

card.name: Rance, Super King
card.text: {B}{R}, {T}: Tap target female creature, planeswalker or adversary, then put a harem counter on it. {1}{B}{R}, {T}, Remove a harem counter from target permanent an opponent controls: Until end of turn, you gain control of that permanent and it gains haste.

card.name: Thugnificent, Voice of Reason
card.text: Whenever an ability of an adversary is activated, you may say "Why?" If that adversary's controller cannot come up with a good answer, counter that activated ability.

card.name: ADV Expansion
card.text: Enchant female Adversary Enchanted permanent cannot be untapped until its creator officially states that the art is not indicative of their breast size.

card.name: Demiurge
card.text: {3}, {T}: Search for a random card from outside of the game and reveal it. If it's a permanent, put a copy of it onto the battlefield. If it's an instant or sorcery, you may cast a copy of it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Pim, Meddling Goddess
card.text: Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, choose a random player. That player gains control of the spell and may choose new targets for that spell. Whenever a nonland permanent enters the battlefield, choose a random player. That player gains control of that permanent.

card.name: Nix, Phyrexian Scion
card.text: Your deck cannot contain lands. At the beginning of your upkeep, gain 5 life. You cannot gain life in any other way. Pay 2 life: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Ettendaal, Arms Dealer
card.text: {R}, {T}: Each player creates an Equipment artifact token named Armament that has "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and Equip {1}.

card.name: Armament
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Equip {1}

card.name: Cemorna, Sundancer
card.text: {G}, {T}: Each player adds {G} to their mana pool at the beginning of their next precombat main phase..

card.name: Kanxi, Master of Procurement
card.text: {U}, {T}: Each player may draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Thedrid, Ornithomancer
card.text: {W}, {T}: Each player creates a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.

card.name: Veela, Excavator
card.text: {B}, {T}: Each player may put up to one target creature card on top of his or her library from his or her graveyard.

card.name: Rowenna, Cryptologist
card.text: {T}: Each player returns a card at random that he or she owns in exile to his or her hand.

card.name: Gard the Draconian
card.text: {2}{W}{B}, {T}: Exile target Adversary. Its controller loses 2 life.

card.name: Rokestra, the Infinite Knowledge
card.text: At the beginning of the game, draw every card in your library. You cannot draw cards. You have no maximum hand size and cannot cast spells. {X}: Play a random spell with a converted mana cost of X from your hand.

card.name: Tea Break
card.text: Pause the game and have a break. If you drink tea during this break, populate.

card.name: The Deepest Lore
card.text: The Deepest Lore deals damage equal to the number of lines of flavor text that target spell or permanent has to target creature minus the number of lines of flavor text it has.

card.name: Waifu Upgrade
card.text: Enchant nonlegendary creature Enchanted creature becomes legendary in addition to its other types and gets +2/+2. Give it a female name that includes its current name as a suffix.

card.name: Waifu Shrine
card.text: When Waifu Shrine enters the battlefield, name a creature with female art in your library. That creature gets +1/+1, gains flying, and becomes an Angel in addition to its other types.
